body_html:
One data point: the file descriptor at the time of error is misaligned:

(gdb) p/x (int)lseek(file, 0, 1)                                                                     
$7 = 0xa0099f
body_text:
One data point: the file descriptor at the time of error is misaligned:
(gdb) p/x (int)lseek(file, 0, 1)                                                                     
$7 = 0xa0099f
body:
One data point: the file descriptor at the time of error is misaligned: 

```
(gdb) p/x (int)lseek(file, 0, 1)                                                                     
$7 = 0xa0099f
```
